4519.quoteText:
When you log in, you need to use at least an email and a password.
Nicknames are optional.
4519.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

4520.quoteText: Passwords and encrypted in our database with the bcrypt algorithm.
4520.title: ToS;DR provides information on its password security mechanism

tosdr.case: The user is informed about security practices
tosdr.tldr: "Passwords and (sic!) encrypted in our database with the bcrypt algorithm."

4521.quoteText: When cancelling your account, we scramble your data in our database so you cannot recover your account and we don't loose your contributions.
4521.title: ToS;DR will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after erasure of personal information
